Extensions

Storages​

GemDescription
shrine-aliyun-ossStorage using Alibaba Cloud OSS
shrine-cloudinaryStorage using Cloudinary
shrine-flickrStorage using Flickr
shrine-fogStorage using Fog
shrine-ftpStorage using an FTP server
shrine-google_cloud_storageStorage using Google Cloud Storage
shrine-gdrive_storageStorage using Google Drive
shrine-gridfsStorage using Mongo GridFS
shrine-redisStorage using Redis
shrine-scpStorage using scp
shrine-sqlStorage using an SQL database
shrine-uploadcareStorage using Uploadcare
shrine-urlStorage for handling remote URLs
shrine-storage-you_tubeStorage using YouTube
shrine-webdavStorage using a WebDAV server

Plugins​

GemDescription
administrate-field-shrinePlugin for Administrate
rails_admin_shrinePlugin for RailsAdmin
shrine-blurhashPlugin for computing Blurhash on images
shrine-cloudimagePlugin for Cloudimage
shrine-colorPlugin for finding dominant color in an image
shrine-configurable_storagePlugin for lazy storage registration
shrine-content_addressablePlugin for generating content addressable locations
shrine-imgixPlugin for Imgix
shrine-transloaditPlugin for Transloadit
shrine-aws-lambdaPlugin for AWS Lambda
hanami-shrinePlugin for Hanami
shrine-mongoidPlugin for Mongoid
shrine-railsPlugin for Rails
shrine-romPlugin for ROM
shrine-tusPlugin for tus server integration

Libraries​

GemDescription
ckeditorIntegration for CKEditor
faster_s3_urlOptimized generation of public and presigned AWS S3 GET URLs
imgproxyIntegration for imgproxy
rails_adminIntegration for RailsAdmin
uppy-s3_multipartIntegration for Uppy AWS S3 Multipart
